data.text: Elihu ua kamaghɨn mɨgei:
“Jop, kɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar maba gavgavim ua Godɨn akam danɨngamiba ikiavɨra iti.
Fofozir aghuir avɨriba nan navim gizɨfa.
Bar guizbangɨra, kɨ akar ifavaritam gamir puvatɨ.
“Nɨ oragh! God gavgavir bar ekiam iti,
Arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba, a men ganɨva men amamangatɨghtɨ, me dughiar ruarimɨn ikian kogham.
God gumazir an damazimɨn deraziba, a deravɨra men gara me geghufi,
Eghtɨ dughiar kuram otoghtɨ, osɨmtɨzim gumazamiziba ikegham,
A me gamima, me deravɨram akaba barasi.
Me an akaba baragh an apengan ikɨ,
Me oraghan aghuaghtɨ, apaniba me mɨsueghtɨ,
“Gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨziba,
Me aghumsɨzir arazibagh amir gumazamizibar tongɨn ikia,
God gumazamizibagh amima, me osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzaziba isi.
“Jop, nɨ gan, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn osɨmtɨzir ekiam atera atam ovenge.
Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn God nɨn gari,
Kamaghɨn nɨ deraghvɨra ganigh, nɨn anɨngagharim nɨ damutɨ, nɨ God dɨpovan markɨ.
Nɨn bizir avɨriba ko nɨn gavgavim,
Nɨ dɨmagarim otivsɨ puvɨra nɨghnɨghan markɨ,
Nɨ faragha arazir kurabagh ami.
“Nɨ deravɨram oragh. God gavgavir ekiam ikia bar pɨn ti.
Tinara God damuamin bizibar a mɨkɨmtɨ, a adar amuam?
Gumazamiziba God ingarizir bizibar gara,
Gumazamiziba bar God amizir bizibar gani,
Elihu ua kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
A nguazir kamɨn dɨpam isa ghuavanaga a gamima,
Egha amozir ofɨziba ko ghuariar overiamɨn itiba,
E kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ, ghuariar manaba ekevegha overiam avara,
God onɨmaribagh amima, da tintinimɨn danganiba bar dar taghtasi.
God ghuariaba ko amozibagh atifa, egha arazir kamra a gumazamiziba bar me gativagha deravɨra men gari.
An uan dafarimningɨn onɨmarim korogha,
Arariba tɨngazima, e fo, amɨnim ko amozim otogham.
